rules.natural: If the brewery acquires a game license, then it is operational.
Either the brewery acquires a game license or it acquires a legislation permit.
Whenever the brewery launches a new beer product, a successful launch follows.
Under the condition that the brewery launches a new beer product, it has a popular new beer product.

rules.prover9_expression: (launches_product(brewery, new_beer) | (avoids_recall(brewery, financial_product) | (-(delays_maintenance(brewery, brewing_equipment) -> maintains_tool(brewery, brewing_equipment)) -> causes_recall(brewery, financial_product))))
rules.natural: Either the brewery launches a new beer product or it avoids a recall of a financial product, or if it is not the case that delaying maintenance implies maintaining the tool, then it causes a recall of a financial product.
If the brewery increases marketing for a financial product, then breaking even implies it is profitable for the quarter.
Under the condition that the brewery reduces costs for a financial product, breaking even leads to it being profitable for the quarter.
If the brewery misses the profit goal target, then it meets the profit goal target.
If the brewery performs quality control on alcohol, then it tests a sample of alcohol.
Either the brewery fails the alcohol test or, if it is not the case that testing a sample implies non-operationality leading to contaminated product, then it does not pass the alcohol test.
Whenever the brewery discards a batch of alcohol, it does not fail the alcohol test.
The brewery sells a batch of alcohol or it discards a batch of alcohol.
The brewery implements a fix for a tool or it reviews a procedure for a tool.
Under the condition that the brewery reviews a procedure for a tool, investigating a complaint leads to not receiving a complaint.
If the brewery modifies the recipe for a new beer, then launching a new beer product implies it does not have a popular new beer product.
Whenever the brewery receives customer feedback on a new beer, it keeps the recipe for a new beer.
The brewery receives customer feedback on a new beer or it conducts internal testing on a new beer.
Provided that the brewery conducts internal testing on a new beer, it modifies the recipe for a new beer.
If the brewery performs emergency maintenance on a tool, then it orders a replacement for the tool.
Whenever the brewery performs emergency maintenance on a tool, it does not complete repairs on the tool.
Provided that the brewery orders a replacement for a tool, it completes repairs on the tool.
Either the brewery undergoes a compliance audit for legislation or delaying maintenance implies maintaining brewing equipment.
Under the condition that the brewery appeals the decision on legislation, it does not fail the audit for legislation.
The brewery appeals the decision on legislation or it accepts a fine for legislation.
Whenever the brewery accepts a fine for legislation, it does not fail the audit for legislation.

rules.prover9_expression: (issues_refund(brewery, financial_product) -> (-(delays_maintenance(brewery, brewing_equipment) -> maintains_tool(brewery, brewing_equipment)) -> causes_recall(brewery, financial_product)))
rules.natural: Provided that the brewery issues a refund for a financial product, if it is not the case that delaying maintenance implies maintaining the tool, then it causes a recall of a financial product.
Either the brewery denies a claim for a financial product or it issues a refund for a financial product.
The brewery processes insurance for a financial product or it rejects a claim for a financial product.
Provided that the brewery fails the quality check inspection, it passes the quality check inspection.
Whenever the brewery rejects a claim for a financial product, it does not deny a claim for a financial product.
If the brewery approves a claim for a financial product, then it does not deny a claim for a financial product.
Under the condition that the brewery has coverage for a financial product, processing insurance implies approving a claim.
Provided that the brewery sanitizes brewing equipment, it does not use contaminated equipment.
If the brewery maintains brewing equipment, then it does not use contaminated equipment.
Whenever the brewery schedules maintenance for brewing equipment, it sanitizes brewing equipment.
The brewery schedules maintenance for brewing equipment or it delays maintenance for brewing equipment.
Provided that it is not the case that delaying maintenance implies maintaining brewing equipment, it does not cause a recall of a financial product.
If it is not the case that the brewery increases marketing or reduces costs for a financial product, then it misses the profit goal target.
Whenever it is not the case that the brewery increases marketing or reduces costs for a financial product, it does not meet the profit goal target.
Provided that it is not the case that acquiring a legislation permit implies the brewery is operational, it violates alcohol sales regulations.
If it is not the case that testing a sample implies non-operationality leading to contaminated alcohol, then the brewery passes the alcohol test.
Under the condition that it is not the case that implementing a fix implies investigating a complaint leads to not receiving a complaint, the brewery updates a protocol for legislation.
If it is not the case that implementing a fix implies investigating a complaint leads to not receiving a complaint, then it does not update a protocol for legislation.
Provided that it is not the case that undergoing a compliance audit implies passing the audit, the brewery fails the audit for legislation.
Under the condition that it is not the case that the brewery sanitizes or maintains brewing equipment, it experiences equipment failure with a tool.
Provided that it is not the case that the negation of acquiring a legislation permit implying operationality leads to not violating alcohol sales regulations, it fails the quality check inspection.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(-(sanitizes_tool(brewery, brewing_equipment) | maintains_tool(brewery, brewing_equipment)) -> -equipment_failure(brewery, tool)) -> emergency_maintenance(brewery, tool))
rules.natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that the negation of sanitizing or maintaining brewing equipment leading to no equipment failure holds, the brewery performs emergency maintenance on a tool.
If the brewery does not have coverage for a financial product, then it lacks coverage for a financial product.
Under the condition that the brewery is not operational, it breaks even.
Whenever the brewery is not operational, it receives a complaint from a customer.
Provided that the brewery is not operational, it investigates a complaint from a customer.
Under the condition that the brewery is not operational, it uses contaminated equipment.
If the brewery is not operational, then it is not profitable for the quarter.
